required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Physiological Effects of Creatine Supplementation in Active Males
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on Muscle Creatine, Body Composition and Exercise Performance in Recreationally Active Males

brief_summary.textblock: This study was designed to examine how different forms of creatine impact active males.

detailed_description.textblock: This study examined the effects of different formulations of creatine nitrate on muscle creatine content, body composition, anaerobic exercise capacity, bench press performance and clinical chemistry panels in recreationally active males.

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on Body Water
primary_outcome.description: Assessing Body Water through Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis (BIA)

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on Body Composition
primary_outcome.description: Assessing Body Compositing through Dual-Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry (DXA)

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on intramuscular creatine
primary_outcome.description: Assessing intramuscular creatine using standard spectrophotometric methods using a microplate spectrophotometer

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on intramuscular phosphocreatine
primary_outcome.description: Assessing intramuscular phosphocreatine using standard spectrophotometric methods using a microplate spectrophotometer

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on intramuscular ATP
primary_outcome.description: Assessing intramuscular Adenosine Triphosphate (ATP) using standard spectrophotometric methods using a microplate spectrophotometer

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on muscular strength
primary_outcome.description: Assessing muscular strength through 1 Repetition Maximum (RM) testing

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on muscular endurance
primary_outcome.description: Assessing muscular endurance through repetition to failure testing

primary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on anaerobic capacity
primary_outcome.description: Assessing anaerobic capacity through 6 x 6 second sprints followed by a 30 second sprint on a Wingate bicycle ergometer

secondary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on training volume (weight lifted x number of repetitions x number of sets)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessing training volume using a calculator

secondary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on self-reported side effects
secondary_outcome.description: Assessing self-reported side effects using a side effects questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Effects of 28 Days of Different Forms of Creatine Supplementation on blood
secondary_outcome.description: Measure standard clinical chemistry panels in the blood to evaluate safety

arm_group.description: Creatine nitrate (5.0 g. creatine monohydrate + 1.5 g. creatine nitrate that provides 1.0 g. of creatine and 0.5 g. nitrate in 2:1 ratio).

intervention.description: Creatine nitrate (5.0 g creatine monohydrate + 1.5 g. creatine nitrate that provides 1.0 g. of creatine and 0.5 g. nitrate in 2:1 ratio)
